item.title: NLP Step by Step
item.description: body { text-align: justify} This post has the aim to shows all the processes related to the NLP and how to use the Naive Bayes Classifier using Python and the nltk library. We use data from spam detection. In NLP a large part of the processing is Feature Engeneering. Tipically the steps are: Regular Expression: that is a formal language for specifying text strings: for example, we can have for the same word the s for plural, the capital first letter and any combination of those.
